body_html:
okay I've just had the same problem haha so I'll continue here.

It seems the older version of tensorflow uses the unreasonable 0 everything approach in rnn.rnn
but the newer version of tensorflow uses the reasonable approach in _dynamic_rnn_step, and it has yet to go back to rnn to change its comments

I've discovered this by trying to use the rnn and upgrading tensorflow from an old version to 0.6.0 just now.

would be nice to have an official clarification though

body:
okay I've just had the same problem haha so I'll continue here.

It seems the older version of tensorflow uses the unreasonable 0 everything approach in rnn.rnn
but the newer version of tensorflow uses the reasonable approach in _dynamic_rnn_step, and it has yet to go back to rnn to change its comments

I've discovered this by trying to use the rnn and upgrading tensorflow from an old version to 0.6.0 just now.

would be nice to have an official clarification though
